questions.question: NAVIGATE : SHIP :: PILOT : ____
questions.explanation: To navigate is to control a ship; to pilot is to control an aircraft.

questions.question: EVAPORATE : LIQUID :: SUBLIMATE : ____
questions.explanation: Evaporation converts liquid to gas; sublimation converts solid to gas.

questions.question: HABITUAL : ROUTINE :: SPONTANEOUS : ____
questions.explanation: Habitual actions are routine; spontaneous actions are unplanned.

questions.question: RETREAT : ADVANCE :: WITHDRAW : ____
questions.explanation: Retreat is the opposite of advance; withdraw is the opposite of engage.

questions.question: GENERATOR : ELECTRICITY :: OVEN : ____
questions.explanation: A generator produces electricity; an oven produces heat.

questions.question: ANALOGY : COMPARISON :: HYPOTHESIS : ____
questions.explanation: An analogy is a comparison; a hypothesis is a prediction.

questions.question: ARCHER : BOW :: MARKSMAN : ____
questions.explanation: An archer uses a bow; a marksman uses a rifle.

questions.question: OBSCURE : CLEAR :: AMBIGUOUS : ____
questions.explanation: Obscure is the opposite of clear; ambiguous is the opposite of definite.

questions.question: CARPENTER : WOOD :: SCULPTOR : ____
questions.explanation: Carpenters shape wood; sculptors shape clay.

questions.question: PREDATOR : HUNT :: SCHOLAR : ____
questions.explanation: Predators hunt; scholars study.

questions.question: COMPASS : DIRECTION :: SCALE : ____
questions.explanation: A compass shows direction; a scale shows weight.

questions.question: MELT : SOLID :: EVAPORATE : ____
questions.explanation: Melting changes solid → liquid; evaporation changes liquid → gas.

questions.question: AUTHOR : NOVEL :: ARCHITECT : ____
questions.explanation: An author creates a novel; an architect designs a building.

questions.question: REPAIR : FIX :: ENHANCE : ____
questions.explanation: Repair means to fix; enhance means to improve.

questions.question: ENGINE : POWER :: HEART : ____
questions.explanation: An engine provides power to a vehicle; the heart provides blood flow to the body.

questions.question: TACTICAL : STRATEGIC :: SHORT-TERM : ____
questions.explanation: Tactics are short-term; strategy is long-term.

questions.question: PLOW : FARMER :: KEYBOARD : ____
questions.explanation: A plow is the tool of a farmer; a keyboard is the tool of a writer.

questions.question: HOSTILE : FRIENDLY :: RECKLESS : ____
questions.explanation: Hostile is the opposite of friendly; reckless is the opposite of careful.

questions.question: SPARK : FIRE :: TRIGGER : ____
questions.explanation: A spark begins a fire; a trigger starts a reaction.

questions.question: EXPERT : SKILLED :: NOVICE : ____
questions.explanation: Expert = highly skilled; novice = inexperienced.

questions.question: CAPTURE : SEIZE :: RELEASE : ____
questions.explanation: Capture means seize; release means free.

questions.question: COMPRESS : SQUEEZE :: EXPAND : ____
questions.explanation: Compress = squeeze; expand = enlarge.

questions.question: DIPLOMAT : NEGOTIATE :: SCIENTIST : ____
questions.explanation: Diplomats negotiate; scientists experiment.

questions.question: SHELTER : PROTECTION :: MEDICINE : ____
questions.explanation: Shelters protect; medicine heals.

questions.question: ABSTRACT : CONCRETE :: THEORETICAL : ____
questions.explanation: Abstract is the opposite of concrete; theoretical is the opposite of practical.
